text: @bgluckman At what age do people stamp their feet, shouting, “NO!” at everything?  2-3 years of age is the general rule.  The forever impeached president has celebrated turning his followers into toddlers.  Look at worldwide COVID-19 statistics and see what temper tantrums have caused.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
